input_query:
You plan to visit 4 European cities for 23 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You want to spend 6 days in Valencia. You would like to meet your friends at Valencia between day 7 and day 12 to tour together. You want to spend 6 days in Santorini. You want to spend 7 days in Athens. You want to spend 7 days in Milan.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Milan and Santorini, Milan and Athens, from Valencia to Athens, Milan and Valencia, Athens and Santorini.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 23 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
